text: You know a game has an amazing soundtrack when a jukebox inside a bar has exclusive themes like this one. That's right, this doesn't play in any scene. I remember the first time I listened to it and it started looping thinking that was it, and then the guitar actually comes in and elevates the whole track even further. Just awesome.
author: SupraDarky

text: I think the Jukebox selection are songs that got finished but didnt had no place because they were meant for scrapped scenarios, like the one that's winter themed, i think it's Owner's Rec., was meant for the scrapped section where you get to play as small Kumatora in Snowcap Mountain, since there are sprites for her wearing winter attire. Or that's what i like to think, since all of the selection sounds too good to be just throwaway songs.
author: Duskool

text:
That's so cool. Another game, The Missing: J. J. Macfield and the Island of Memories also has a jukebox with its own unique songs that can't be heard anywhere else, too. 
This song here is impressively good! I agree with the person who says it's probably a song originally composed for the game that had no other use so it was included here.
author: Daytime Sky

author: Rutger

text: Maxyaju 1232 This track doesn’t play in any story scene. It can only be heard at the Dur-T Café’s jukebox on the Highway in Chapter 5 onward.
